casebody.data:
The EVENING JOURNAL ASSOCIATION, Publisher of the Jersey Journal, Plaintiff,
v.
CITY OF BAYONNE and Robert F. Sloan, in his Capacity as Custodian of Records for the City of Bayonne, Defendant-Movant. M-793 September Term 2017
080703 Supreme Court of New Jersey. March 12, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for a stay is denied without prejudice to defendant making an application for a stay of the United States District Court order of November 16, 2017 in the federal courts.
